import React, {Component} from 'react'; import NavBar from './NavBar'; import { Button,Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Courses from '../Features/Courses'; import ProgressBar from 'react-bootstrap/ProgressBar' import{Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import firebase from '../firebase/base'; //const userType = firebase.collection('user').doc(user.uid).get({ type }); const user = firebase.auth().currentUser var name, email, photoUrl, emailVerified firebase.auth().onAuthStateChanged(user => { if (user) { name = user.displayName; email = user.email; photoUrl = user.photoURL; emailVerified = user.emailVerified; var uid = user.uid; console.log(user.email); } else { this.uid = null } }); var db = firebase.firestore(); db.collection('user') .get() .then(snapshot => { const user = [] snapshot.forEach(doc => { const data = doc.data() user.push(data) }) console.log(user) }) .catch(error => console.log(error)) console.log(user) class AccInfo extends Component { render() { return (

{user.name}

/*

Personal Infomation

School: Baruch College
Name: Span.Span
Personal Email: { email }
School Email: testing@baruchmail.cuny.edu
Cell: (000)-000-0000
Address: 90-90 spam st spam, spam,11020

Courses

*/ ); } } export default AccInfo;
